original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor yang snang bar byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor yang snang bar byas te /
translated: It also illuminates the maṇḍalas of all tathāgatas, bodhisattvas, śrāvakas, and pratyekabuddhas.

original: de rnams kyi zhal nas zhugs pas de dag gi thugs ka'i rdo rje la bskor ba byas te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi zhal nas zhugs pas de dag gi thugs ka'i rdo rje la bskor ba byas te /
translated: It enters their mouths and circles around the vajra in their hearts.

original: de dag gi shes rab kyi ye shes de drangs nas chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rang gi kha nas zhugs te /
analyzed: de dag gi shes rab kyi ye shes de drangs nas chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rang gi kha nas zhugs te /
translated: It draws forth their gnosis of the wisdom consort and, through the sameness of the objective selflessness of phenomena, it enters one’s own mouth.

original: rang gi snying ga la gnas pa'i zla ba la sngags kyi yi ge dang gcig tu gyur nas gnas par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi snying ga la gnas pa'i zla ba la sngags kyi yi ge dang gcig tu gyur nas gnas par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: It becomes one with the mantra letters on the moon in one’s heart and is visualized as abiding there.

original: de ltar rgyun du zhugs pa bsgom pa la gnas pa sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpas bcom @39b ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs ye shes kyi sku'i sgo nas dmigs so zhes pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs kyi sgo nas de'i gzugs rjes su bsam mo zhes pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar rgyun du zhugs pa bsgom pa la gnas pa sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpas bcom @39b ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs ye shes kyi sku'i sgo nas dmigs so zhes pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs kyi sgo nas de'i gzugs rjes su bsam mo zhes pa dang /
translated: He should contemplate his form through the shape of the moon disc.

original: yi ge aa'i gzugs kyi sgo nas de'i gzugs rjes su bsgom mo zhes so //
analyzed: yi ge aa'i gzugs kyi sgo nas de'i gzugs rjes su bsgom mo zhes so //
translated: He should meditate on his form through the form of the letter A.

original: de ltar rnam pa gsum gyi tshul gyis bsgoms pas de nyid kyi sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sku dus ring po ma yin pa kho nar 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar gzung ste /
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa gsum gyi tshul gyis bsgoms pas de nyid kyi sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sku dus ring po ma yin pa kho nar 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar gzung ste /
translated: Through meditating in this way through the three aspects, he will not be delayed for a long time in attaining the emanation body of the Bhagavat, the wisdom being Manjushri, and will quickly attain the wisdom body of the Bhagavat, the wisdom being Manjushri.

original: mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / nam mkha'i gzhi la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sku dang ldan par gyur pa rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / nam mkha'i gzhi la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sku dang ldan par gyur pa rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ste /
translated: One will see the buddhas and bodhisattvas who dwell in the ground of space, and who are endowed with the emanation body.

original: de yang bsgom pa'i dbang de las tshe 'di kho na la sangs rgyas pa nyid dang rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'thob bo zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de yang bsgom pa'i dbang de las tshe 'di kho na la sangs rgyas pa nyid dang rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'thob bo zhes pa'i don to //
translated: And that is the meaning of the statement that by the power of meditation, one attains buddhahood and Vajrasattvahood in this very life.

original: de ltar rim pa 'dis sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rim par gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar rim pa 'dis sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rim par gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, by this process, the stage of manifest, complete enlightenment of the Web of Magic is taught.

original: da ni 'di'i rigs kyi dbye bas shes rab kyi 'khor lo gzhan drug rnams kyang bshad de /
analyzed: da ni 'di'i rigs kyi dbye bas shes rab kyi 'khor lo gzhan drug rnams kyang bshad de /
translated: Now, by the division of its families, the other six wisdom wheels are also explained.

original: de la re zhig dang po'i rnal 'byor thams cad sngon du byas la /
analyzed: de la re zhig dang po'i rnal 'byor thams cad sngon du byas la /
translated: Therein, first of all, having performed all the preliminaries of the first yoga,

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa bsdus te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa bsdus te /
translated: one should gather the mandala of the Bhagavat Great Vairocana.

original: de'i gnas su yi ge hr'i: las bskyed pa'i snang ba mtha' yas sku mdog dmar po ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis gnas par bsams la /
analyzed: de'i gnas su yi ge hr'i: las bskyed pa'i snang ba mtha' yas sku mdog dmar po ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis gnas par bsams la /
translated: In its place, one should imagine that one is abiding in the samādhi of Avalokiteśvara, generated from the syllable hṛ, red in color, endowed with the samādhi mudra.

original: de'i thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas de bzhin du bsgoms nas /
analyzed: de'i thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas de bzhin du bsgoms nas /
translated: Having meditated on the primordial buddha at his heart,

original: de'i thugs kar yang rtsibs brgyad pa'i 'khor lo mu khyud bzhi dang ldan pa rtsa ba'i sngags la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i thugs kar yang rtsibs brgyad pa'i 'khor lo mu khyud bzhi dang ldan pa rtsa ba'i sngags la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on the wheel with eight spokes and four rims, completely surrounded by the root mantra, and so forth.

original: de nas yang rtsibs brgyad la sa bon rnams ni aom badzra t'ikshn'a ya te nam:zhes bkod de /
analyzed: de nas yang rtsibs brgyad la sa bon rnams ni aom badzra t'ikshn'a ya te nam:zhes bkod de /
translated: Then, on the eight spokes, one should arrange the seed syllables oṃ vajra-tīkṣṇa-naya-tenaṃ.

original: 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus na yi ge hr'i:las gyur pa'i sku rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba sku mdog dmar po byis pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
analyzed: 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus na yi ge hr'i:las gyur pa'i sku rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba sku mdog dmar po byis pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
translated: In the center of the wheel, one should meditate on the body vajra called “Sharp,” generated from the syllable hṛ, red in color, adorned with the ornaments of a youth,

original: gtsug phud lngas dbu brgyan pa /
analyzed: gtsug phud lngas dbu brgyan pa /
translated: with a crown of five locks of hair,

original: dar sna tshogs kyi na bza' mnabs pa /
analyzed: dar sna tshogs kyi na bza' mnabs pa /
translated: wearing a silken garment of various colors,

original: phyag g-yon pas padma 'dzin pa /
analyzed: phyag g-yon pas padma 'dzin pa /
translated: holding a lotus in the left hand,

original: g-yas kyi shes rab kyi ral gri 'dzin pa bsgoms te /
analyzed: g-yas kyi shes rab kyi ral gri 'dzin pa bsgoms te /
translated: Meditate on the right-side sword of wisdom.

original: de'i thugs kar sngon bzhin du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hr'i:bsgoms te /
analyzed: de'i thugs kar sngon bzhin du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hr'i:bsgoms te /
translated: Meditate on the syllable hrīḥ on a moon disc at his heart, as before.

original: spro ba dang bsdu ba gong ma bzhin du rim par byas nas bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: spro ba dang bsdu ba gong ma bzhin du rim par byas nas bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Meditate on the emanation and reabsorption, as before.

original: de kho na nyid bzhin du yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yi ge h'um las bskyed pa'i mi bskyod pa sku mdog sngon pos gnon gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa @40a * //
analyzed: de kho na nyid bzhin du yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yi ge h'um las bskyed pa'i mi bskyod pa sku mdog sngon pos gnon gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa @40a * //
translated: As for reality, meditate on Akṣobhya generated from the syllable hūṃ in the center of the maṇḍala, with the mudra of suppression.

original: bsgoms nas / de'i thugs kar yang dang po'i sangs rgyas dang de bzhin du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bsgoms te /
analyzed: bsgoms nas / de'i thugs kar yang dang po'i sangs rgyas dang de bzhin du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bsgoms te /
translated: Meditate on the first buddha and likewise an eight-spoked wheel at his heart.

original: sngon bzhin du sngags dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: sngon bzhin du sngags dgod par bya'o //
translated: Arrange the mantra as before.

original: aom du: kha tstshe d'a ya te na ma: zhes pa'i sa bon brgyad rtsibs rnams la bkod nas /
analyzed: aom du: kha tstshe d'a ya te na ma: zhes pa'i sa bon brgyad rtsibs rnams la bkod nas /
translated: Arrange the eight seed syllables oṃ duḥkha-ccheda-yate namaḥ on the spokes.

original: lte ba la yi ge h'um las bskyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal sdug bsngal gcod pa sku mdog sngon po gzhon nu'i gzugs can byis pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: lte ba la yi ge h'um las bskyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal sdug bsngal gcod pa sku mdog sngon po gzhon nu'i gzugs can byis pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: At the navel, generated from the syllable hūṃ, is the bhagavān Mañjuśrī, the blue terminator of suffering, with the form of a youth, adorned with all the ornaments of a child,

original: zur phud lnga pa /
analyzed: zur phud lnga pa /
translated: with five locks of hair,

original: rgya nag gi dar mnabs pa /🔽g-yon gyis rdo rje /
analyzed: rgya nag gi dar mnabs pa / g-yon gyis rdo rje /
translated: wearing Chinese silk,🔽holding a vajra in the left hand

original: g-yas kyis ral gri 'dzin pa bsgoms nas /
analyzed: g-yas kyis ral gri 'dzin pa bsgoms nas /
translated: and a sword in the right hand.

original: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge h'um bsgoms te /
analyzed: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge h'um bsgoms te /
translated: Meditate on that, and at his heart, on a moon mandala, meditate on the syllable hūṃ.

original: de bzhin du spro pa la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du spro pa la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should perform the emanation and so forth.

original: yang de kho na bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yi ge aa las bskyed pa'i rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya dang ldan pa bsgoms te /
analyzed: yang de kho na bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yi ge aa las bskyed pa'i rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya dang ldan pa bsgoms te /
translated: Again, in the same way, in the center of the maṇḍala, generated from the syllable a, meditate on Vairocana, white in color, with the mudra of supreme enlightenment,

original: de'i thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas /
analyzed: de'i thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas /
translated: and at his heart, the primordial buddha,

original: de kho na bzhin du 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa la aom pradzny'a dzny'a na m'urt'a ya te ma: zhes pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge rnams rtsibs bcu la bkod nas /
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa la aom pradzny'a dzny'a na m'urt'a ya te ma: zhes pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge rnams rtsibs bcu la bkod nas /
translated: Just so, on a wheel with ten spokes, the seed syllables of the mantra Oṃ prajñājñāna-mūrtaye tame are arranged on the ten spokes.

original: 'khor lo'i lte ba la yi ge aa las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das shes rab ye shes sku mdog dkar po /
analyzed: 'khor lo'i lte ba la yi ge aa las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das shes rab ye shes sku mdog dkar po /
translated: In the center of the wheel, from the letter A arises Bhagavat Prajñājñāna, white in color,

original: zur phud lnga pa /
analyzed: zur phud lnga pa /
translated: with five locks of hair,

original: byis pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
analyzed: byis pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
translated: adorned with the ornaments of a youth,

original: sna tshogs kyi gos kyis brgyan pa /🔽g-yon gyis 'khor lo ;
analyzed: sna tshogs kyi gos kyis brgyan pa / g-yon gyis 'khor lo ;
translated: adorned with variegated garments,🔽holding a wheel in the left hand,

original: / g-yas kyis shes rab kyi ral gri 'dzin pa bsgoms nas /
analyzed: / g-yas kyis shes rab kyi ral gri 'dzin pa bsgoms nas /
translated: and a sword of wisdom in the right hand.

original: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng na yi ge aa bsgoms te /
analyzed: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng na yi ge aa bsgoms te /
translated: Meditate on that, and at his heart, on a moon, meditate on the letter A.

original: de kho na bzhin du spro ba la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du spro ba la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: Just so, emanation and so forth are performed.

original: de kho na bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na yi ge sa bon aa las byung ba'i don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang gu mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa bsgoms te /
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na yi ge sa bon aa las byung ba'i don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang gu mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa bsgoms te /
translated: Just so, in the center of the maṇḍala, meditate on Amoghasiddhi arisen from the seed syllable A, green in color, with the mudrā of fearlessness,

original: de'i thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas /
analyzed: de'i thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas /
translated: and at his heart, the primordial buddha.

original: de'i thugs kar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa /
analyzed: de'i thugs kar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa /
translated: At his heart is an eight-spoked wheel,

original: sngon bzhin du rtsa ba'i sngags la sogs pa rnam par dgod par bya ba bsgoms nas /
analyzed: sngon bzhin du rtsa ba'i sngags la sogs pa rnam par dgod par bya ba bsgoms nas /
translated: as before, with the root mantra and so forth arrayed.

original: de nas yang rtsibs brgyad pa la aom dzny'a na k'a y'a ya te nam: zhes pa'i sa bon brgyad bkod de /
analyzed: de nas yang rtsibs brgyad pa la aom dzny'a na k'a y'a ya te nam: zhes pa'i sa bon brgyad bkod de /
translated: Then, on the eight spokes, one should place the eight seed syllables, “Om jñāna kāyāya namo.

original: 'khor lo'i lte ba la yi ge aa las gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi sku mdog ljang gu /
analyzed: 'khor lo'i lte ba la yi ge aa las gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi sku mdog ljang gu /
translated: ” In the center of the wheel, from the letter A, is the Bhagavat, the body of pristine awareness, green in color,

original: gzhon nu'i rgyan dang / gtsug phud lngas dbu brgyan pa /
analyzed: gzhon nu'i rgyan dang / gtsug phud lngas dbu brgyan pa /
translated: adorned with the ornaments of a youth and a crown of five dry skulls,

original: g-yon gyis sna tshogs rdo rje /
analyzed: g-yon gyis sna tshogs rdo rje /
translated: holding a vajra cross in the left hand

original: g-yas kyis shes rab kyi ral gri 'dzin pa bsgoms te /
analyzed: g-yas kyis shes rab kyi ral gri 'dzin pa bsgoms te /
translated: and a sword of wisdom in the right hand.

original: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng na yi ge aa bsgoms nas /
analyzed: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng na yi ge aa bsgoms nas /
translated: At his heart, on a moon disc, one should meditate on the letter A.

original: de kho na bzhin @40b du spro ba dang bsdu ba byas nas bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de kho na bzhin @40b du spro ba dang bsdu ba byas nas bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, as before, one should meditate on the emanation and reabsorption.

original: yang kho na bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yi ge aom las byung ba'i rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog ser po mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan par bsgoms nas /
analyzed: yang kho na bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yi ge aom las byung ba'i rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog ser po mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan par bsgoms nas /
translated: Again, just as before, in the center of the mandala, meditate on Ratnasaṃbhava arisen from the letter oṃ, yellow in color, endowed with the mudra of supreme generosity,

original: de'i thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas de kho na bzhin du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la rtsa ba'i sngags la sogs pa dang ldan par bsgoms te /
analyzed: de'i thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas de kho na bzhin du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la rtsa ba'i sngags la sogs pa dang ldan par bsgoms te /
translated: and at his heart, the primordial buddha, just as before, endowed with the root mantra on an eight-spoked wheel.

original: de'i rtsibs brgyad la ao w'a g'i shvar'a ya te na ma: zhes pa'i sa bon bkod nas /
analyzed: de'i rtsibs brgyad la ao w'a g'i shvar'a ya te na ma: zhes pa'i sa bon bkod nas /
translated: On the eight spokes, arrange the seed syllables of the oṃ vāgīśvaraṇi te namaḥ mantra.

original: 'khor lo lte ba la sa bon yi ge aom las bskyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dbang phyug sku mdog ser po /
analyzed: 'khor lo lte ba la sa bon yi ge aom las bskyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dbang phyug sku mdog ser po /
translated: In the center of the wheel, generate Bhagavat Vāgīśvara arisen from the seed syllable oṃ, yellow in color,

original: rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa /
translated: endowed with all ornaments,

original: zur phung lnga pa /
analyzed: zur phung lnga pa /
translated: with five crests,

original: sna tshogs kyi na bza' mnabs pa /🔽g-yon gyis rin po che /
analyzed: sna tshogs kyi na bza' mnabs pa / g-yon gyis rin po che /
translated: wearing variegated garments,🔽holding a jewel in the left hand,

original: g-yas kyis shes rab kyi ral gri 'dzin pa bsgoms te /
analyzed: g-yas kyis shes rab kyi ral gri 'dzin pa bsgoms te /
translated: and holding a wisdom sword in the right hand.

original: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge aom bsgoms nas /
analyzed: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge aom bsgoms nas /
translated: At his heart, one should meditate on the syllable oṃ upon a moon disk.

original: de bzhin du spro ba dang bsdu ba la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du spro ba dang bsdu ba la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should perform the emanation and re-absorption, and so forth.

original: de kho na bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na yi ge aa las gyur pa'i byang chub kyi sems rdo rje sku mdog dkar po //
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na yi ge aa las gyur pa'i byang chub kyi sems rdo rje sku mdog dkar po //
translated: In the same way, in the center of the maṇḍala, one should meditate on Bodhicittavajra arisen from the syllable aṃ, white in color,

original: 'jo sgeg gi tshul dang ldan pa /
analyzed: 'jo sgeg gi tshul dang ldan pa /
translated: endowed with a graceful manner,

original: rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can /
analyzed: rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can /
translated: having the crown of the five families,

original: rdo rje snyems pas bzhugs pa /
analyzed: rdo rje snyems pas bzhugs pa /
translated: residing in the vajra-arrogance,

original: rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs pa /
analyzed: rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs pa /
translated: adorned with all ornaments,

original: rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa bsgoms nas /
analyzed: rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa bsgoms nas /
translated: holding a vajra and a bell,

original: de'i thugs kar bcom ldan 'das dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgoms te /
analyzed: de'i thugs kar bcom ldan 'das dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgoms te /
translated: and at his heart, one should meditate on the Blessed One, the Primordial Buddha.

original: de'i thugs kar 'khor lo rtsibs dgu pa rtsa ba'i sngags la sogs pa bkod pa'i rtsibs la aom aa ra pa tsa n'a ya te na ma: zhes pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge dgu rnams bkod nas /
analyzed: de'i thugs kar 'khor lo rtsibs dgu pa rtsa ba'i sngags la sogs pa bkod pa'i rtsibs la aom aa ra pa tsa n'a ya te na ma: zhes pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge dgu rnams bkod nas /
translated: At his heart, one should meditate on a nine-spoked wheel with the root mantra and so forth, and on the spokes arranged with the nine seed syllables oṃ ā ra pa ca na ā ya ta ne maḥ.

original: 'khor lo'i lte ba la yi ge aa las bskyed pa bcom ldan 'das aa ra pa tsa na zhes bya ba ye shes sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po /
analyzed: 'khor lo'i lte ba la yi ge aa las bskyed pa bcom ldan 'das aa ra pa tsa na zhes bya ba ye shes sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po /
translated: At the center of the wheel, generated from the letter A, is the transcendent lord called “Ararapatana,” the awareness being, white in color,

original: byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
translated: adorned with the ornaments of a child,

original: zur phud lnga pa can /
analyzed: zur phud lnga pa can /
translated: having five locks of hair,

original: sna tshogs kyi na bza' mnabs pa /
analyzed: sna tshogs kyi na bza' mnabs pa /
translated: wearing variegated garments,

original: phyag na bo ti dang ral gri 'dzin pa bsgoms te /
analyzed: phyag na bo ti dang ral gri 'dzin pa bsgoms te /
translated: holding a scripture and a sword in his hands.

original: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng na yi ge aa bsgoms nas gong ma bzhin du spro ba dang bsdu pa dang zhugs pa dang gnas pa brtan par gyur pa la sogs pa byas nas bsgom par bya'o zhes kun la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng na yi ge aa bsgoms nas gong ma bzhin du spro ba dang bsdu pa dang zhugs pa dang gnas pa brtan par gyur pa la sogs pa byas nas bsgom par bya'o zhes kun la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Meditate on him, and at his heart, on a moon, visualize the letter A. As before, emanate and reabsorb light rays, and having made them enter and stabilize, and so forth, meditate. This should be applied to all.

original: 'dir yang rigs kyi dbye bas dpal sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rim pa drug tu rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang rigs kyi dbye bas dpal sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rim pa drug tu rig par bya'o //
translated: Here, too, by the division of families, the glorious Net of Illusory Manifestations is to be known as six stages of manifest, complete enlightenment.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa la 'khor lo bdun @41a * //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa la 'khor lo bdun @41a * //
translated: Therefore, in the Noble Praise in Honor of One Worthy of Honor, there are seven wheels,

original: rigs bdun du 'gyur te /
analyzed: rigs bdun du 'gyur te /
translated: and seven families.

original: de rnams kyang bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyang bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya'o //
translated: These should be known from the guru's instructions.

original: de rnams dang ldan pa ni sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams dang ldan pa ni sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: One who possesses those is the stage of manifest, complete enlightenment by means of the Magical Net.

original: 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa mtshan gsang sngags kyi don du rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba las sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rim pa'i dbang du byas pa ste bzhi pa tshigs su bcad pa gsum
analyzed: 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa mtshan gsang sngags kyi don du rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba las sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rim pa'i dbang du byas pa ste bzhi pa tshigs su bcad pa gsum
translated: This concludes the fourth chapter, the chapter on the stage of manifest, complete enlightenment by means of the Magical Net, from the Great Commentary on the Verse Summary of the Perfection of Wisdom called Illumination of the Meaning.

original: pa'o / // / de nas da ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo nas byang chub kyi sems rdo rje spro ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: pa'o / // / de nas da ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo nas byang chub kyi sems rdo rje spro ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ni /
translated: Now, the stage of generating the mind of enlightenment by means of the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm and so on is stated.

original: 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
translated: Thus the Bhagavān buddhas

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so on.

original: de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi don bshad zin to //
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi don bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of Bhagavān Buddha has been explained.

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas aa las byung //🔽zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas aa las byung //🔽zhes pa ni /
translated: Perfect buddhahood arises from A.

original: de la rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: de la rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of perfect buddha has already been explained.

original: aa las byung ba ni yi ge aa las bskyed pa ste /
analyzed: aa las byung ba ni yi ge aa las bskyed pa ste /
translated: Arisen from a is generated from the letter a,

original: bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' yongs su dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sku'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' yongs su dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sku'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the Blessed One, the completely pure knowledge being, is the nature of the gnosis body of the Tathagata.

original: da ni de'i thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng gi gang yin pa yi ge aa de'i khyad par gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni de'i thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng gi gang yin pa yi ge aa de'i khyad par gsungs pa /
translated: Now, he states the distinction of that letter a which is on the moon disk in his heart:

original: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / ces pa ste /🔽rab tu gyur pa ni mchog ste /
analyzed: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / ces pa ste / rab tu gyur pa ni mchog ste /
translated: A is the supreme of all letters.🔽The supreme is the best.

original: mchog gi dngos po nyid ni mchog nyid do //
analyzed: mchog gi dngos po nyid ni mchog nyid do //
translated: The nature of the best is supremacy.

original: yi ge kun ni yi ge thams cad do //
analyzed: yi ge kun ni yi ge thams cad do //
translated: All letters are all letters.

original: de'i mchog ni rab ste /
analyzed: de'i mchog ni rab ste /
translated: The best of those is the supreme.

original: de rnams kyi sgo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sgo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the door of those.

original: don chen zhes pa la /
analyzed: don chen zhes pa la /
translated: As for great meaning,

original: don yang yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas don chen te /
analyzed: don yang yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas don chen te /
translated: it is a great meaning because it is a meaning and it is great.

original: 'gro ba kun la phan par byed pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun la phan par byed pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the cause of benefiting all beings.

original: yi ge dam pa yin zhes pa ni //
analyzed: yi ge dam pa yin zhes pa ni //
translated: The best of syllables is said to be

original: rnam grangs gzhan dang gzhan gyis mi 'gyur ba'i phyir na ste /
analyzed: rnam grangs gzhan dang gzhan gyis mi 'gyur ba'i phyir na ste /
translated: because it is not changed by other enumerations.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid kyis mi g-yo ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid kyis mi g-yo ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is not moved by the nature of the perfect limit.

original: yi ge yang de yin la dam pa yang de nyid yin pas yi ge dam pa yin zhes so //
analyzed: yi ge yang de yin la dam pa yang de nyid yin pas yi ge dam pa yin zhes so //
translated: It is the best of syllables because it is a syllable and it is the best.

original: rim pa 'dis kyang ye shes sems dpa' la sogs pa'i yi ge dag gi rang bzhin brjod pa gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: rim pa 'dis kyang ye shes sems dpa' la sogs pa'i yi ge dag gi rang bzhin brjod pa gsungs pa ste /
translated: By this process, he declares the nature of the syllables of the knowledge hero and so forth.

original: de dag nyid re re yang rnal 'byor pa rang gi sems las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma lus pa las bzlog pa'i ngo bo nyid du so sor brtag par bya ba ni /
analyzed: de dag nyid re re yang rnal 'byor pa rang gi sems las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma lus pa las bzlog pa'i ngo bo nyid du so sor brtag par bya ba ni /
translated: Each of them is to be individually examined as the nature of all the mandala deities arisen from the yogin’s own mind, with the essence of the reversal of all discordant factors.

original: de ltar rang gi ting nge 'dzin rnams dang de'i phyin ci log mi dmigs par ston @41b pa nyid kyi phyir dmigs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi gnyen po stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar rang gi ting nge 'dzin rnams dang de'i phyin ci log mi dmigs par ston @41b pa nyid kyi phyir dmigs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi gnyen po stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Thus, because it teaches the non-apprehension of one's own concentrations and their opposites, it has the characteristic of the door of liberation called emptiness, the antidote to the discordant side of apprehension.

original: de ltar mtshan ma dang / log pa'i smon pa dang / phyin ci log gi 'du byed dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnyen po'i phyogs kyi ngo bo rim pa bzhin du mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i bdag nyid rnams bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar mtshan ma dang / log pa'i smon pa dang / phyin ci log gi 'du byed dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnyen po'i phyogs kyi ngo bo rim pa bzhin du mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i bdag nyid rnams bya ste /
translated: Thus, one should make the doors of liberation called signlessness, wishlessness, and non-conditioning, which are the antidote side of those endowed with signs, wrong wishes, and inverted conditioning, respectively.

original: de la yang go rims bzhin du rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i rigs kyi yum gyi rang bzhin gyi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la yang go rims bzhin du rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i rigs kyi yum gyi rang bzhin gyi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: And they are taught in order, taking as their nature the mothers of the families of Vajrasattva, etc.

original: khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
analyzed: khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
translated: From the depths, unborn.

original: ces bya ba ni sems ma rdo rje ma'i rang bzhin no ;
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sems ma rdo rje ma'i rang bzhin no ;
translated: This is the nature of Vajradhatviśvarī.

original: / de la yang khong nas 'byung ba ni yi ge aa'o //
analyzed: / de la yang khong nas 'byung ba ni yi ge aa'o //
translated: And that is the letter A, which arises from within.

original: de yang skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: de yang skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: And that is the nature of non-arising,

original: de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dang me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dang me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is the essence of the realm of phenomena and the cause of mirror-like pristine awareness.

original: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
analyzed: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
translated: It is free from verbal expression.

original: zhes pa ni rin chen rdo rje ma'i sgo nas te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni rin chen rdo rje ma'i sgo nas te /
translated: This is from the perspective of Ratnaratna.

original: tshig rnams brjod pa ni tshig tu brjod pa ste ;
analyzed: tshig rnams brjod pa ni tshig tu brjod pa ste ;
translated: Verbal expression is verbal expression.

original: de med pa ni spangs pa ste /
analyzed: de med pa ni spangs pa ste /
translated: Its absence is freedom,

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la tshig gi rtsol ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la tshig gi rtsol ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because in the pristine awareness of equality there is no effort of words.🔽It is the supreme cause of all expressions.

original: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog / ces pa ni chos kyi rdo rje ma'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog / ces pa ni chos kyi rdo rje ma'i sgo nas so //
translated: This is from the perspective of Dharmaratna.

original: mngon par brjod pa ni brjod pa ste /
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa ni brjod pa ste /
translated: Expression is verbal expression.

original: phung po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin chos thams cad kyi mngon par brjod pa ni brjod pa kun te /
analyzed: phung po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin chos thams cad kyi mngon par brjod pa ni brjod pa kun te /
translated: The expression of all phenomena, which have the nature of the aggregates and so forth, is all expressions.

original: da'i rgyu ni byed rgyu ste /
analyzed: da'i rgyu ni byed rgyu ste /
translated: Its cause is the active cause,

original: so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: which is the individually discerning pristine awareness.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mchog ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mchog ste /
translated: Therefore, it is supreme,

original: gtso bo zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gtso bo zhes pa'i don to //
translated: meaning principal.

original: tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
analyzed: tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
translated: It illuminates all words.

original: ces pa ni las kyi rdo rje ma'i rang bzhin gyis te /
analyzed: ces pa ni las kyi rdo rje ma'i rang bzhin gyis te /
translated: This is the nature of Karmavajri.

original: tshig kyang de yin la don kun yang de yin pas tshig kun te /
analyzed: tshig kyang de yin la don kun yang de yin pas tshig kun te /
translated: It is words and all meanings, therefore it is all words.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: lha'i skad dang klu'i skad dang gnod sbyin skad ces pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: lha'i skad dang klu'i skad dang gnod sbyin skad ces pa la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: the language of the gods, the language of the nagas, the language of the yakshas, and so forth.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rab tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rab tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, it is called illuminating,

original: ji ltar skal ba dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la so sor snang ba 'byung bas so //
analyzed: ji ltar skal ba dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la so sor snang ba 'byung bas so //
translated: because it arises in the mindstreams of all fortunate sentient beings, appearing individually.

original: sgo tha dad pa'i chos bstan pa yang bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sgo tha dad pa'i chos bstan pa yang bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The teaching of the Dharma through different doors is also the nature of the gnosis of purposeful activity.

original: de'i phyir na rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi po 'di rnams ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir na rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi po 'di rnams ni /
translated: Therefore, these four perfections, Vajra Sattvva and so forth,

original: aa a'a aam aa:zhes pa'i yi ge bzhi las bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: aa a'a aam aa:zhes pa'i yi ge bzhi las bskyed par bya'o //
translated: should be generated from the four syllables a a a: a:.

original: de nas yang sems gang kho na chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin tha mal pa'i gzung ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang bral bas de nyid kho na glo bur gyi dri @42a * //
analyzed: de nas yang sems gang kho na chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin tha mal pa'i gzung ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang bral bas de nyid kho na glo bur gyi dri @42a * //
translated: Then, the mind that is the nature of the dharmadhatu is free from the aspects of ordinary objects of clinging and so on.🔽

original: ma med cing 'od gsal ba nyid kyi phyir dang / ye shes gzhan 'byung ba'i mtshan ma nyid kyi phyir na me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: ma med cing 'od gsal ba nyid kyi phyir dang / ye shes gzhan 'byung ba'i mtshan ma nyid kyi phyir na me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: Then again, the mind itself, which has the nature of the dharmadhatu, is free from the aspects of ordinary perception, and so on. It is the nature of mirror-like primordial wisdom, because it is itself free from adventitious stains and is clear light, and because it is the very sign of the arising of other primordial wisdoms.

original: chos la dmigs pa'i snying rje la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyis rgyud gzhan du byed pa la mchog tu mi 'dzin pa'i phyir na mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: chos la dmigs pa'i snying rje la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyis rgyud gzhan du byed pa la mchog tu mi 'dzin pa'i phyir na mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: It is the nature of the primordial wisdom of equality, because it does not hold as supreme the activity of transforming other mind-streams through the nature of compassion and so on that has the dharmas as its object.

original: shes bya thams cad la phyin ci ma log pas so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: shes bya thams cad la phyin ci ma log pas so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: It is the primordial wisdom of individual investigation, because it is unmistaken with regard to all objects of knowledge.

original: 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: It is the nature of the primordial wisdom of accomplishment of activities, because it is the very cause of benefit for all worlds.

original: 'di dag kyang go rims bzhin du rtag pa la sogs pa gtso bo'o //
analyzed: 'di dag kyang go rims bzhin du rtag pa la sogs pa gtso bo'o //
translated: And these are the principal ones, in order, of the steadfast.

original: rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin no //
translated: They are the nature.

original: de nyid gsungs pa ;
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa ;
translated: That is taught:

original: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
analyzed: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
translated: The great worship is great passion.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: And so on.

original: de la yang dang por snang ba mtha' yas kyis nye bar gzung ba ni 'dod chags gtso bor gyur pas gzung ba'i don te /
analyzed: de la yang dang por snang ba mtha' yas kyis nye bar gzung ba ni 'dod chags gtso bor gyur pas gzung ba'i don te /
translated: Therein, first, the one held by Amitabha is the meaning held by passion as the principal one.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: That is taught:🔽Passion, hatred, folly,

original: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // zhes pa'o //
translated: and so on.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha' kun la khyab pa'i mchod pa bstan pa'i dus la ni mchod pa chen po zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha' kun la khyab pa'i mchod pa bstan pa'i dus la ni mchod pa chen po zhes gsungs so //
translated: At the time of teaching the worship that pervades the space of all the Tathagatas, it is called the great worship.

original: mah'a'i sgra ni mchod pa la brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: mah'a'i sgra ni mchod pa la brjod pa yin no //
translated: The word mahat means worship.

original: chen po'i bdag nyid kyi 'dod chags dang 'dod chags chen po'o //🔽mchod pa yang de yin la 'dod chags chen po yang de yin pas /
analyzed: chen po'i bdag nyid kyi 'dod chags dang 'dod chags chen po'o // mchod pa yang de yin la 'dod chags chen po yang de yin pas /
translated: It is passion of the nature of greatness, and it is great passion.🔽It is worship and it is great passion,

original: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che ;🔽/ zhes pa'o //
analyzed: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che ; / zhes pa'o //
translated: so it is the great worship, great passion.

original: de la 'dod chags che ni sems can smin cing grol ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de la 'dod chags che ni sems can smin cing grol ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Therein, great passion is characterized by the maturation and liberation of sentient beings.

original: de yang bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
analyzed: de yang bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
translated: Moreover, it is the characteristic of the Blessed One, Vajrasattva.

original: 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das //
translated: The great passion is the Blessed One,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
translated: Vajrasattva, the Tathagata.

original: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it occurs.

original: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed //
analyzed: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed //
translated: He delights all sentient beings.

original: ces pa ni 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can dga' zhing mgu la bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid byed pas na /
analyzed: ces pa ni 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can dga' zhing mgu la bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid byed pas na /
translated: This is because he delights, satisfies, and delights all sentient beings who engage in passion, and he acts as the nature of great bliss.

original: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa ste /
translated: He delights all sentient beings.

original: snang ba mtha' yas kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: snang ba mtha' yas kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: This is the nature of Amitabha.

original: zhe sdang la spyod pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhe sdang la spyod pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: From the perspective of those who engage in hatred, it is said:

original: mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che ;
analyzed: mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che ;
translated: Great worship is great hatred,

original: / nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba //🔽zhes pa ste /
analyzed: / nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba // zhes pa ste /
translated: great enemy of all afflictions.

original: mchod pa chen po zhes pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: mchod pa chen po zhes pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of great worship has already been explained.

original: zhe sdang che ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: zhe sdang che ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Great hatred is Akshobhya.

original: de yang nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba yin te /
analyzed: de yang nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba yin te /
translated: Moreover, he is the great enemy of all afflictions.

original: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi dgra chen po zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi dgra chen po zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It is the great enemy of the afflictions and the secondary afflictions.

original: gti mug la spyod pa'i dbang @42b du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: gti mug la spyod pa'i dbang @42b du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: With reference to those who are dominated by delusion, it is said:

original: mchod pa chen po gti mug che //🔽gti mug blo ste gti mug sel //
analyzed: mchod pa chen po gti mug che // gti mug blo ste gti mug sel //
translated: The great worship is the great delusion.

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /
translated: It is the mind of delusion, the dispeller of delusion.

original: mchod pa chen po ni gong ma bzhin no //
analyzed: mchod pa chen po ni gong ma bzhin no //
translated: The great worship is as above.

original: gti mug chen po ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: gti mug chen po ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: The great delusion is Vairocana.

original: blo la gti mug pa ni gti mug gi blo ste /
analyzed: blo la gti mug pa ni gti mug gi blo ste /
translated: The mind of delusion is the mind of delusion.

original: gti mug kyang de yin la blo yang de nyid yin pas gti mug blo'o //
analyzed: gti mug kyang de yin la blo yang de nyid yin pas gti mug blo'o //
translated: It is delusion and it is the mind, thus it is the mind of delusion.

original: de sel bar byed pa ni 'joms par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de sel bar byed pa ni 'joms par byed pa'o //
translated: The dispeller of it is the destroyer of it.

original: khro ba la spyod pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /🔽mchod pa chen po khro ba che //
analyzed: khro ba la spyod pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa / mchod pa chen po khro ba che //
translated: With reference to those who are dominated by anger, it is said:🔽The great worship is the great anger.

original: khro ba chen po dgra che ba //🔽zhes pa ste /
analyzed: khro ba chen po dgra che ba // zhes pa ste /
translated: The great anger is the great enemy.

original: mchod pa chen po ni gong ma bzhin no //🔽khro ba chen po ni don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: mchod pa chen po ni gong ma bzhin no // khro ba chen po ni don yod grub pa'o //
translated: The great worship is as above.🔽The great anger is Amoghasiddhi.

original: khro ba chen po dgra che ba //
analyzed: khro ba chen po dgra che ba //
translated: The great anger is the great enemy.

original: sems can dang sems can ma yin pa'i yul gyi phyir khro ba chen po ste /
analyzed: sems can dang sems can ma yin pa'i yul gyi phyir khro ba chen po ste /
translated: Great anger is for the sake of sentient beings and non-sentient beings.

original: de nyid kyi dgra chen po zhes so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi dgra chen po zhes so //
translated: It is the great enemy of just that.

original: chags par byed pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: chags par byed pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: It is said with regard to the one who is attached:

original: mchod pa chen po chags pa che //🔽chags pa thams cad sel bar byed //
analyzed: mchod pa chen po chags pa che // chags pa thams cad sel bar byed //
translated: Great worship, great attachment,

original: ces pa ste /
analyzed: ces pa ste /
translated: the remover of all attachments.

original: mchod pa chen po'i don ni gong ma bzhin du bshad do //
analyzed: mchod pa chen po'i don ni gong ma bzhin du bshad do //
translated: The meaning of great worship is explained as above.

original: chags pa chen po ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
analyzed: chags pa chen po ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
translated: Great attachment is Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: chags pa thams cad sel bar byed pa ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa yongs su dag par byed pa'i don nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: chags pa thams cad sel bar byed pa ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa yongs su dag par byed pa'i don nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The remover of all attachments is for the sake of purifying all mundane and supramundane perfections.

original: stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi rnams dang / chos dbyings kyi skye mched kyi sgo nas ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir na de nyid kyang yang nang du phyin ci log pa dang mi mthun pa'i gnyen po nang stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi rnams dang / chos dbyings kyi skye mched kyi sgo nas ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir na de nyid kyang yang nang du phyin ci log pa dang mi mthun pa'i gnyen po nang stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang /
translated: Because it is the cause of all meditative concentrations through the four doors of liberation such as emptiness and so on and the door of the source of the dharmadhatu, it is also the antidote that is the opposite of inner error, the aspect of inner emptiness.

original: phyi rol du dmigs pa dang bral bas na phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang / de dag gi rten dang lus mi dmigs pa'i rnag bzhin nyid kyis phyi nang stong ba nyid kyi bdag nyid dang / snod kyi 'jig rten la lhag par chags pa dang bral ba nyid kyis chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: phyi rol du dmigs pa dang bral bas na phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang / de dag gi rten dang lus mi dmigs pa'i rnag bzhin nyid kyis phyi nang stong ba nyid kyi bdag nyid dang / snod kyi 'jig rten la lhag par chags pa dang bral ba nyid kyis chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid de //
translated: Because it is free from external observation, it is the nature of outer emptiness, and because it is the nature of the nonobservation of the support and body, it is the nature of outer and inner emptiness, and because it is free from attachment to the world of the environment, it is the characteristic of emptiness of the great.

original: de dag kho na me long lta bu'i ye shes la brten pa rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi'i bdag nyid ces pa 'di gsungs pa /
analyzed: de dag kho na me long lta bu'i ye shes la brten pa rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi'i bdag nyid ces pa 'di gsungs pa /
translated: It is said that those very [four] are the nature of the four meditative concentrations of Vajrasattva and so on, which are based on the mirror-like exalted wisdom.

original: 'dod pa chen po bde ba che //
analyzed: 'dod pa chen po bde ba che //
translated: Great desire, great bliss,

original: dga' ba chen po mgu ba che //🔽zhes pa ni ;
analyzed: dga' ba chen po mgu ba che // zhes pa ni ;
translated: great joy, great satisfaction.

original: de la 'dod pa chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: de la 'dod pa chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: Here, great desire is Vajrasattva.

original: 'dod par byed pa ni 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod par byed pa ni 'dod pa ste /
translated: Desire is that which is desired,

original: 'dun pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'dun pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: having the meaning of aspiration.

original: bde ba chen po ni rdo rje rgyal po'o //🔽dga' ba chen po ni rdo rje chags pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po ni rdo rje rgyal po'o // dga' ba chen po ni rdo rje chags pa'o //
translated: Great bliss is Vajraraja.🔽Great joy is Vajraraga.

original: mgu ba chen po ni rdo rje legs pa'o //🔽de nyid kyis mig dang gzugs la sogs pa'i bag chags gnas @43a * //
analyzed: mgu ba chen po ni rdo rje legs pa'o // de nyid kyis mig dang gzugs la sogs pa'i bag chags gnas @43a * //
translated: Great satisfaction is Vajrasadhu.

original: gyur pa'i rang bzhin me long lta bu'i ye shes las grub pa ste /
analyzed: gyur pa'i rang bzhin me long lta bu'i ye shes las grub pa ste /
translated: Just that is the mirror-like pristine wisdom, which is accomplished from the transformation of the habitual tendencies of the eye and form, etc.

original: nang gi bdag nyid mi dmigs pa la sogs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid mi dmigs pa la sogs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: , because of the consecration of the non-apprehension of the inner nature, etc.

original: ji ltar rang rang gi phyin ci log gi mthun pa'i phyogs bzlog pa nyid kyang de dag gis byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba dang / dgug pa dang / rjes su chags pa dang / legs pa'i dngos po'i rgyud kyi phyir na yang de rnams kyi go rims so //
analyzed: ji ltar rang rang gi phyin ci log gi mthun pa'i phyogs bzlog pa nyid kyang de dag gis byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba dang / dgug pa dang / rjes su chags pa dang / legs pa'i dngos po'i rgyud kyi phyir na yang de rnams kyi go rims so //
translated: The order of the emptinesses is also for the sake of the arising of the enlightenment mind, for the summoning of the enlightenment mind, for the passion of the enlightenment mind, and for the cause of the continuum of the good thing, respectively.

original: de ltar stong pa nyid kyi ye shes de nyid la yang mtshan ma med pa'i phyir na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa'i mtshan ma la yang mchog tu mi 'dzin pa'i phyir na don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi mtshan ma yongs su mi 'dzin pa'i phyir na 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: de ltar stong pa nyid kyi ye shes de nyid la yang mtshan ma med pa'i phyir na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa'i mtshan ma la yang mchog tu mi 'dzin pa'i phyir na don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi mtshan ma yongs su mi 'dzin pa'i phyir na 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: Thus, the emptiness of emptiness is because that very wisdom of emptiness is also signless. The emptiness of the ultimate is because one does not grasp at the sign of the ultimate as supreme. The emptiness of the compounded is because one does not grasp at the sign of the compounded collection of merit as real.

original: 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs la yang mtshan mar mchog tu mi 'dzin pa'i phyir na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnams te /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs la yang mtshan mar mchog tu mi 'dzin pa'i phyir na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnams te /
translated: The emptiness of the uncompounded is because one does not grasp at the sign of the collection of the uncompounded enlightenment as supreme.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste //
analyzed: gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste //
translated: His form is great, his body is great,

original: kha dog che zhing lus bong che //
analyzed: kha dog che zhing lus bong che //
translated: his color is great, his body is great,

original: ming yang che zhing rgya che ba //
analyzed: ming yang che zhing rgya che ba //
translated: his name is great, he is great,

original: dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin //
translated: he is the great, vast maṇḍala.

original: zhes pa'o // de la gzugs che lus kyang che ba ni rdo rje rin chen no //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // de la gzugs che lus kyang che ba ni rdo rje rin chen no //
translated: There, his form is great, his body is great is Vajraratna.

original: gzugs su rung bas na gzugs te /
analyzed: gzugs su rung bas na gzugs te /
translated: It is form because it is suitable as form.

original: mi rtag ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: mi rtag ces pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of impermanent is the meaning of great form.

original: gzugs chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs chen po ste /
analyzed: gzugs chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs chen po ste /
translated: That which possesses great form is great form.

original: che ba nyid ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzugs nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khams gsum pa chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: che ba nyid ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzugs nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khams gsum pa chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Greatness is the nature of the wish-fulfilling jewel form, the consecration of all tathāgatas as the Dharma king of the three realms.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na lus che zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na lus che zhes pa ste /
translated: Therefore, it is said his body is great.

original: gzhal du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na snang bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhal du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na snang bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is because he illuminates immeasurable buddha fields.

original: kha dog che zhing lus bong che //
analyzed: kha dog che zhing lus bong che //
translated: His color is great, his body is great.

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje nyi ma ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje nyi ma ste /
translated: This is Vajrasūrya.

original: kha dog kyang de yin la che ba yang de nyid yin pas kha dog che ba ste /
analyzed: kha dog kyang de yin la che ba yang de nyid yin pas kha dog che ba ste /
translated: It is a great color, since it is a color and it is great.

original: gdong drug dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gdong drug dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It has six faces.

original: lus bong chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni lus bong che ste /🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa rnams kyi dngos po ye shes kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽ming yang che zhing rgya che ba ni rdo rje tog go //🔽ming yang che ba dang gang ldan pa de ni ming yang che zhing ste /
analyzed: lus bong chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni lus bong che ste / shin tu rnam par dag pa thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa rnams kyi dngos po ye shes kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nyid kyi phyir ro // ming yang che zhing rgya che ba ni rdo rje tog go // ming yang che ba dang gang ldan pa de ni ming yang che zhing ste /
translated: It has a great body, since it is a great body.🔽It is a great name, since it is a name and it is great.

original: grags pa chen po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: grags pa chen po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is a great fame, since it is a fame and it is great.

original: gang las she na /
analyzed: gang las she na /
translated: From what?

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mchog tu mthar phyin pa'i phyir na'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mchog tu mthar phyin pa'i phyir na'o //
translated: From the perfection of giving, since it is the supreme perfection.

original: de'i phyir na yang rgya che ba ni rgya yang de yin la chen po yang de yin pas @43b rgya chen po ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir na yang rgya che ba ni rgya yang de yin la chen po yang de yin pas @43b rgya chen po ste /
translated: Therefore, it is also great, since it is great and it is vast.

original: thams cad sbyin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad sbyin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he gives everything.

original: dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa ni rdo rje bzhad pa'o //🔽dkyil ni rgyan dang chas par byed pas na dkyil lo //🔽dkyil de len par byed pas na 'khor te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa ni rdo rje bzhad pa'o // dkyil ni rgyan dang chas par byed pas na dkyil lo // dkyil de len par byed pas na 'khor te /
translated: The great vast mandala is the vajra smile.

original: dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The mandala is the center, and it is the mandala because it takes up the center.

original: yangs pa ni rgyas pa ste /
analyzed: yangs pa ni rgyas pa ste /
translated: It is vast because it is extensive,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams kun la khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams kun la khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it pervades all world systems.

original: gang gi bshad pa'i yangs pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po de ni dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gi bshad pa'i yangs pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po de ni dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin te /
translated: The great vast mandala is the essence of the explanation of that,

original: khams gsum snang bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: khams gsum snang bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it illuminates the three realms.

original: de dag kyang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi 'khor rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa bzhi'i bdag nyid de /
analyzed: de dag kyang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi 'khor rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa bzhi'i bdag nyid de /
translated: And that is the retinue of the gnosis of equality, having the nature of the four, vajra jewel and so forth.

original: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gnas gyur pa'i bdag nyid mnyam nyid ye shes la gzung 'dzin dag pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas ji ltar gsungs pa'i mtshan ma med pa'i phyir dang / ji ltar rang gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs pa'i sgo nas kyang dbang bskur ba dang /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gnas gyur pa'i bdag nyid mnyam nyid ye shes la gzung 'dzin dag pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas ji ltar gsungs pa'i mtshan ma med pa'i phyir dang / ji ltar rang gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs pa'i sgo nas kyang dbang bskur ba dang /
translated: The four vajras are in order: the vajra of the basis, the vajra of the view, the vajra of practice, and the vajra of result.

original: 'od 'phel ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba dang / rab tu dga' ba bsgrub pa'i phyir na rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa bzhi po de dag gi go rims so //
analyzed: 'od 'phel ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba dang / rab tu dga' ba bsgrub pa'i phyir na rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa bzhi po de dag gi go rims so //
translated: The vajra of the basis is the basis of all vajras.🔽The vajra of the view is the view of the indivisibility of samsara and nirvana.🔽The vajra of practice is the practice of the indivisibility of method and wisdom.🔽The vajra of the result is the result of the indivisibility of the two kayas.🔽The vajra of the basis is the basis of all vajras.🔽The vajra of the view is the view of the indivisibility of samsara and nirvana.🔽The vajra of practice is the practice of the indivisibility of method and wisdom.🔽The vajra of the result is the result of the indivisibility of the two kayas.🔽The vajra of the basis is the basis of all vajras.🔽The vajra of the view is the view of the indivisibility of samsara and nirvana.🔽The vajra of practice is the practice of the indivisibility of method and wisdom.🔽The vajra of the result is the result of the indivisibility of the two kayas.🔽The vajra of the basis is the basis of all vajras.🔽The vajra of the view is the view of the indivisibility of samsara and nirvana.🔽The vajra of practice is the practice of the indivisibility of method and wisdom.🔽The vajra of the result is the result of the indivisibility of the two kayas.🔽The vajra of the basis is the basis of all vajras.🔽The vajra of the view is the view of the indivisibility of samsara and nirvana.🔽The vajra of practice is the practice of the indivisibility of method and wisdom.🔽The vajra of the result is the result of the indivisibility of the two kayas.🔽The vajra of the basis is the basis of all vajras.

original: de nyid mtha' dang ldan pa'i sems can gyi smon lam la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / bdag gi thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i 'khor ba dor bar mi bya'o zhes pa'i smon lam kun du mi 'dzin pas na thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: de nyid mtha' dang ldan pa'i sems can gyi smon lam la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / bdag gi thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i 'khor ba dor bar mi bya'o zhes pa'i smon lam kun du mi 'dzin pas na thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The vajra of the view is the view of the indivisibility of samsara and nirvana.🔽The vajra of practice is the practice of the indivisibility of method and wisdom.🔽The vajra of the result is the result of the indivisibility of the two kayas.🔽The vajra of the basis is the basis of all vajras.🔽The vajra of the

original: bdag gis lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la dge ba ched du dor bar mi bya zhes pa la mngon par ma zhen pa'i phyir na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid dam rigs bdag gis dag par bya'o zhes pa don du gnyer ba dang bral ba'i phyir na rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid rnams so //
analyzed: bdag gis lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la dge ba ched du dor bar mi bya zhes pa la mngon par ma zhen pa'i phyir na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid dam rigs bdag gis dag par bya'o zhes pa don du gnyer ba dang bral ba'i phyir na rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid rnams so //
translated: The emptiness of intrinsic nature is because of freedom from striving for the thought, I will purify with my intrinsic nature, my nature, or my lineage.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba ste //
analyzed: shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba ste //
translated: The wielder of the great weapon of wisdom,🔽The supreme great hook of the afflictions,

original: nyon mongs lcags kyu che ba'i mchog / grags chen snyan grags chen po ste //
analyzed: nyon mongs lcags kyu che ba'i mchog / grags chen snyan grags chen po ste //
translated: The great fame, the great renown,

original: snang ba chen po gsal ba che //
analyzed: snang ba chen po gsal ba che //
translated: The great light, the great illumination.

original: zhes so // de la shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba ni rdo rje chos so //
analyzed: zhes so // de la shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba ni rdo rje chos so //
translated: Among them, the wielder of the great weapon of wisdom is Vajradharma.

original: de la shes rab ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: de la shes rab ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes te /
translated: Among them, wisdom is the wisdom of discernment.

original: de nyid mtshon te mtshon cha'o //
analyzed: de nyid mtshon te mtshon cha'o //
translated: That itself is a weapon.

original: de 'dzin pas na shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba ste /
analyzed: de 'dzin pas na shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba ste /
translated: Because he holds that, he is the wielder of the great weapon of wisdom.

original: de nyid ye shes kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba yang de yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas shes rab mtshon @44a * //
analyzed: de nyid ye shes kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro // shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba yang de yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas shes rab mtshon @44a * //
translated: because it is the nature of pristine consciousness.

original: chen 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: chen 'chang ba'o //
translated: It is also the great holder of the weapon of wisdom, and it is also great, therefore it is the great holder of the weapon of wisdom.

original: nyon mongs lcags kyu che ba'i mchog ni rdo rje rnon po'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs lcags kyu che ba'i mchog ni rdo rje rnon po'o //
translated: The supreme great hook of afflictions is Vajra-Tīkṣṇa.

original: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
translated: Afflictions are desire and so on.

original: de rnams kyi lcags kyur gyur pa nyid kyi phyir na nyon mongs lcags kyu'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi lcags kyur gyur pa nyid kyi phyir na nyon mongs lcags kyu'o //
translated: Because it becomes the hook of those, it is the hook of afflictions.

original: lcags kyu dang 'dra bas lcags kyu ste /
analyzed: lcags kyu dang 'dra bas lcags kyu ste /
translated: It is a hook because it is like a hook.

original: nyon mongs pa la dbang thob pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa la dbang thob pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it obtains power over afflictions.

original: nyon mongs pa'i lcags kyu yang de nyid yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas nyon mongs lcags kyu che'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i lcags kyu yang de nyid yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas nyon mongs lcags kyu che'o //
translated: It is also the great hook of afflictions, and it is also great, therefore it is the great hook of afflictions.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na yang mchog ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na yang mchog ste /
translated: For that very reason, it is also supreme.

original: rab ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rab ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “supreme” is “excellent.”

original: grags chen snyan grags chen po ni rdo rje rgyu ste /
analyzed: grags chen snyan grags chen po ni rdo rje rgyu ste /
translated: Great fame, great renown, is Vajra-Hetu.

original: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i thabs su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rgyud las bstan pa de la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir grags pa chen po dang gang ldan pa de ni grags chen no //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i thabs su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rgyud las bstan pa de la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir grags pa chen po dang gang ldan pa de ni grags chen no //
translated: He is the great fame, because he possesses great fame, since he is the nature of the universal monarch.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la khyab par snyan grags dang gang ldan ba de ni snyan grags chen po zhes so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la khyab par snyan grags dang gang ldan ba de ni snyan grags chen po zhes so //
translated: He is the great fame, because he possesses great fame, since he pervades all the worlds without exception.

original: snang ba chen po gsal ba che ni rdo rje smra pa'o //
analyzed: snang ba chen po gsal ba che ni rdo rje smra pa'o //
translated: The great light, the great radiance, is Vajra Speech.

original: khams gsum khyab par snang ba'i 'od zer chen po dang gang ldan pa de ni snang ba chen po'o //
analyzed: khams gsum khyab par snang ba'i 'od zer chen po dang gang ldan pa de ni snang ba chen po'o //
translated: He is the great light, because he possesses great light rays that illuminate the three worlds.

original: de nas yang tshig gi nyes pa myur ba dang thogs pa dang bar ma rnams yongs su spangs te mi smra ba'i rang bzhin gyis bzlas pa'i dus na sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la rgya cher snang ba nyid kyi phyir na gsal ba che'o //
analyzed: de nas yang tshig gi nyes pa myur ba dang thogs pa dang bar ma rnams yongs su spangs te mi smra ba'i rang bzhin gyis bzlas pa'i dus na sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la rgya cher snang ba nyid kyi phyir na gsal ba che'o //
translated: Then, having completely abandoned the faults of speech—rapid, stammering, and middling—at the time of the recitation, because it appears extensively in the mindstreams of all sentient beings, it is “greatly clear.”

original: de rnams kyang rnam par rtog pa'i yid gnas gyur pa'i mtshan nyid so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes la brten pa'i rdo rje chos la sogs pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: de rnams kyang rnam par rtog pa'i yid gnas gyur pa'i mtshan nyid so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes la brten pa'i rdo rje chos la sogs pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: Those are the nature of Vajradharma and so on, which are based on the individually discerning pristine consciousness, the characteristic of the transformation of the conceptual mind.

original: so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes la ji ltar gsungs pa'i phyin ci log byang bas chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid so sor kun du rtog pa'i phyir de'i sgo nas rang bzhin dag pa'i chos nyid dang / shes rab ye shes dang /
analyzed: so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes la ji ltar gsungs pa'i phyin ci log byang bas chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid so sor kun du rtog pa'i phyir de'i sgo nas rang bzhin dag pa'i chos nyid dang / shes rab ye shes dang /
translated: Because the individually discerning pristine consciousness purifies the errors as they are explained, it individually discerns the thatness of all phenomena. Therefore, through that, it is the pristine consciousness of individual discernment, the nature of the pure dharmatā, and the wisdom pristine consciousness.

original: phyir mi ldog pa dang / dgongs pa'i don ma lus pa yongs su shes pa rnams kyi rgyud nyid kyi phyir na 'di nyid rdo rje chos la sogs pa de rnams kyi go rims so //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa dang / dgongs pa'i don ma lus pa yongs su shes pa rnams kyi rgyud nyid kyi phyir na 'di nyid rdo rje chos la sogs pa de rnams kyi go rims so //
translated: Because it is the continuum of those who are irreversible and who completely understand the meaning of the intention, this is the order of those beginning with Vajra Dharma.

original: de nyid mtshan dang dpe byad kyi bdag nyid kyi gzugs kyi sku la 'du byed pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi chos kyi sku la 'du mi byed pa'i phyir na chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: de nyid mtshan dang dpe byad kyi bdag nyid kyi gzugs kyi sku la 'du byed pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi chos kyi sku la 'du mi byed pa'i phyir na chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: Because it is the form body, which is the nature of the major and minor marks, it is the emptiness of intrinsic nature. Because it is not the form body, which is the nature of the powers, fearlessnesses, and so on, it is the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: gang zag dang chos la sgro 'dogs par 'du mi byed pa'i phyir na dngos po med ba stong @44b pa nyid dang / ji skad gsungs pa'i stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la skur pa 'debs pa dang mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i phyir na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnams so //
analyzed: gang zag dang chos la sgro 'dogs par 'du mi byed pa'i phyir na dngos po med ba stong @44b pa nyid dang / ji skad gsungs pa'i stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la skur pa 'debs pa dang mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i phyir na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnams so //
translated: Because it does not impute the exaggeration of persons and phenomena, it is the emptiness of nonthings. Because it does not deprecate the emptiness that is characterized as it has been explained, it is the emptiness of the nature of nonthings.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang //
analyzed: mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang //
translated: The wise one is the wielder of the great magic

original: sgyu 'phrul chen po'i don grub pa //🔽sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga' //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul chen po'i don grub pa // sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga' //
translated: , the one who accomplishes the aim of the great magic🔽, the one who delights in the great magic

original: sgyu 'phrul chen po'i mig 'phrul can //🔽zhes pa ste /
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul chen po'i mig 'phrul can // zhes pa ste /
translated: , the one who has the magic eye of the great magic.

original: de la mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang ni rdo rje las so //
analyzed: de la mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang ni rdo rje las so //
translated: Therein, the wise one is the wielder of the great magic, Vajrakarman.

original: de la sgyu 'phrul ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs shing rgyas pa'i mchod pa mang po'i sprul pa'o //
analyzed: de la sgyu 'phrul ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs shing rgyas pa'i mchod pa mang po'i sprul pa'o //
translated: Therein, magic is the emanation of the manifold and extensive worship of all the Tathagatas.

original: de 'dzin pa'i phyir na sgyu 'phrul 'chang ba ste /
analyzed: de 'dzin pa'i phyir na sgyu 'phrul 'chang ba ste /
translated: Because he holds that, he is the wielder of the magic.

original: chen po yang de yin la sgyu 'phrul yang de nyid yin pas sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: chen po yang de yin la sgyu 'phrul yang de nyid yin pas sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang ba'o //
translated: He is the great magic, and he is the wielder, therefore he is the wielder of the great magic.

original: de nyid kyi phyir na mkhas pa pandi ta ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir na mkhas pa pandi ta ste /
translated: For that very reason, he is the wise one, the pandita,

original: mchod pa'i las des bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchod pa'i las des bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he has accumulated the equipment of merit by that act of worship.

original: sgyu 'phrul chen po'i don grub pa ni rdo rje bsrung ba'o //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul chen po'i don grub pa ni rdo rje bsrung ba'o //
translated: The one who accomplishes the aim of the great magic is Vajravarman.

original: de la sgyu 'phrul gyi don ni sprul pa'i don to //
analyzed: de la sgyu 'phrul gyi don ni sprul pa'i don to //
translated: Therein, the aim of the magic is the aim of the emanation.

original: de yis sems can le lo can rnams rab tu spro ba sgrub par byed pas na sgyu 'grul don grub ste /
analyzed: de yis sems can le lo can rnams rab tu spro ba sgrub par byed pas na sgyu 'grul don grub ste /
translated: and it is the great accomplishment of the illusion, since it accomplishes the aim of lazy sentient beings.

original: chen po yang de yin la sgyu 'phrul don grub kyang de nyid yin pas sgyu 'phrul chen po'i don grub pa'o //🔽sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga' ni rdo rje gnod sbyin no //
analyzed: chen po yang de yin la sgyu 'phrul don grub kyang de nyid yin pas sgyu 'phrul chen po'i don grub pa'o // sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga' ni rdo rje gnod sbyin no //
translated: It is the great illusion, since it is the great illusion, and it is the accomplishment of the aim of the illusion, since it is the accomplishment of the aim of the illusion.

original: sgyu 'phrul la dga' ba ni sgyu 'phrul la dga' ba ste /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i sprul pa la dga' ba zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul la dga' ba ni sgyu 'phrul la dga' ba ste / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i sprul pa la dga' ba zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It is the great illusion, since it is the great illusion, and it is the accomplishment of the aim of the illusion, since it is the accomplishment of the aim of the illusion.

original: sgyu 'phrul dga' ba la chags pa ni dga' ba ste /🔽sgyu 'phrul dga' bas dga'o //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dga' ba la chags pa ni dga' ba ste / sgyu 'phrul dga' bas dga'o //
translated: It is the great illusion, since it is the great illusion, and it is the accomplishment of the aim of the illusion, since it is the accomplishment of the aim of the illusion.🔽It is the great illusion, since it is the great illusion, and it is the accomplishment of the aim of the illusion, since it is the accomplishment of the aim of the illusion.🔽It is the great illusion, since it is the great illusion, and it is the accomplishment of the aim of the illusion, since it is the accomplishment of the aim of the illusion.🔽It is the great illusion, since it is the great illusion, and it is the accomplishment of the aim of the illusion, since it is the accomplishment of the aim of the illusion.🔽It is the great illusion, since it is the great illusion, and it is the accomplishment of the aim of the illusion, since it is the accomplishment of the aim of the illusion.🔽It is the great illusion, since it is the great illusion, and it is the accomplishment of the aim of the illusion, since it is the accomplishment of the aim of the illusion.🔽It is the great illusion, since it is the great illusion, and it is the accomplishment of the aim of the illusion, since it is the accomplishment of the aim of the illusion.🔽It is the great illusion, since it is the great illusion, and it is the accomplishment of the aim of the illusion, since it is the accomplishment of the aim of the illusion.

original: chen po yang de yin la sgyu 'phrul dga' bas dga' ba yang de nyid yin pas sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga'o //
